Course-name: Mathematical Aspects of Biomedical Electronic System Design
content: This course is a system design-oriented course aimed to provide exposure to mathematical analysis and its importance in the translational biomedical systems. Biomedical electronics and subsequent mathematical analysis are popular research areas, and this course is an introduction to both. The emphasis is on biostatistical aspects with an introduction to standard Biological system design and experimental protocols.
